title: 1.24 Modern Debates: Disappearing the Patriarchs
itunes:title: Modern Debates: Disappearing the Patriarchs
description: In 1970 most scholars thought that Genesis and Exodus were reliable guides to the history of the Israelites. Today, even the most traditionalist of archaeologists agree that the narratives of the Israelites' history told in Genesis and Exodus are just stories. In this episode I explore how the consensus of 1970 was overthrown.
content:encoded: In 1970 most scholars thought that Genesis and Exodus were reliable guides to the history of the Israelites. Today, even the most traditionalist of archaeologists agree that the narratives of the Israelites' history told in Genesis and Exodus are just stories. In this episode I explore how the consensus of 1970 was overthrown.
itunes:subtitle: Forty years of archaeological research have found no evidence of the Patriachs, or the Exodus.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
